attributes.action: Stop ticket touts in the UK reselling concert tickets for extortionate prices
attributes.additional_details:
This website outlines exactly what ticket touting means and why  it should be stopped

http://fanfairalliance.org/faqs/
attributes.background: In the UK there are 4 major ticket resellers, StubHub, Ticketmaster Get Me In, Viagogo and Seatwave. They use specialist software to harvest thousands of tickets from primary ticket selling sites and resell them at extortionate prices. Taking money from the music industry and tickets from real fans

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/171819
